title: Identifying pathogenic variants using a multimodal machine learning approach
text: Yicheng et al develop MAGPIE, a machine learning-based multi-modality accurate pathogenicity predictor for all non-synonymous mutations. (Genome Med, 2023)

title: Detecting somatic mutations de novo from single-cell RNA sequencing data
text: Tianyun et al develop RESA -- Recurrently Expressed SNV Analysis that identifies expressed somatic mutations from scRNA-seq with high precision (Genome Medicine, 2023)

title: Temporally integrated transcriptome analysis reveals ASFV pathology and host response dynamics
text: Providing new insights into ASFV pathogenicity research and novel drug or vaccine targets
